channel.title: Help with new shops
channel.description:
ok, just started trying to code so probably stupid but I still need the help with it.
I'm using the testScape source and alot of my shops when i talk or trade with them it says i need a fly fishing rod to fish here and they won't talk to me, also when i try making a new shop Eg. in Varrock bank when i talk to the NPC nothing happens and when i try trading the NPC i get disconnected anybody got any ideas?

item.title: Help with new shops
item.dc:creator: @Wariors Wariors
item.description:
@Wariors wrote:

only used NPC once (Bob) he didnt have any other shop in client.java appeared once in auto spawn (for my shop) and was in shop list only for my shop, still got disconnected and got the same message in my RunServer, any other ideas? lol :o

Read full topic

item.title: Help with new shops
item.dc:creator: @flamy flamy
item.description:
@flamy wrote:

i dunno and hey man whats happening?!

Read full topic

item.title: Help with new shops
item.dc:creator: @Demonix Demonix
item.description:
@Demonix wrote:

you cant have the same NPC in 2 spots with 2 different shops & make sure the shop #'s are the same

Read full topic

item.title: Help with new shops
item.dc:creator: @Wariors Wariors
item.description:
@Wariors wrote:

ok, i checked everything i’d done and it’s ok by what you said so I went on an tried, got disconnected and the message i got in my RunServer i copied if it helps at all.

Java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -67 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:14313) at client.packetProcess(client.java:13291) at client.process(client.java:13261) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:136) at server.main(server.java:45) Game saved for player Wes ClientHandler: Client Wes disconnected.

that’s the message i got once it had dissconnected me for trying to trade and once again just talking to him did nothing either, maybe the message helps? thanks for the help

Read full topic

item.title: Help with new shops
item.dc:creator: @CryptoScape CryptoScape
item.description:
@CryptoScape wrote:

add a npc in client.java search for first cick npc

go down and look for wannashop…

copy that and add that

now put a wanna shop number something like number 80

and change the npcId…in another number (number of the npc you wanna trade)

now open shops.cfg and add a shop the shopnumber = 80

now open autospawn.cfg and right under THE OTHER SHOPS like zaffs staf shop put your shop npc

if you dont put it under other shops it will not work reply++ plz

Read full topic
